rules_text:
Modal spells you cast have entwine {X}, where X is the number of modes that spell has. [i](You may pay an additional {X} as you cast that spell. If you do, choose all of its modes.)[/i]
[i]Narrative[/i] – Whenever you cast a modal or split spell, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on The Traveler.
